title: LFM - 5v5 Ranked Team
body:
Hi All,

**No More Tears
**

 Is  currently seeking a permanent Top Lane & Jungler to join our casual group of players.

_Skype / Team Speak is a must as we love to talk shit._

For invites or to trial us out, send me a friend request.

Cheers,

Rishu
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
